TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BamlLocalizabilityResolver extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 解析二进制 XAML (BAML) 中类和属性的可本地化设置。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizabilityResolver> 由用 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer> 来解析中的类和属性的可本地化性设置 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 。 当资源提取时，以及在更新本地化时，都会调用解析程序 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 。
资源提取时 (<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer.ExtractResources%2A>) ，解析程序：
- <xref:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 当构造可本地化的资源时，在中提供类和属性 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer> 。
- 为中的元素提供格式首选项 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] ，因此元素被设置为内联标记的格式。
在更新本地化的时间 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] (<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer.UpdateBaml%2A>) ，解析程序：
- 将格式设置标记解析回类中。
- 解析包含类定义的程序集的名称。
- <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizabilityResolver> 是一个内部类的子类，它执行类函数的实际方面 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer> 。

MemberSignature.Value: protected BamlLocalizabilityResolver ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: BamlLocalizabilityResolver();

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability GetElementLocalizability (string assembly, string className);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability GetElementLocalizability(string assembly, string className) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetElementLocalizability (assembly As String, className As String) As ElementLocalizability
public: abstract System::Windows::Markup::Localizer::ElementLocalizability ^ GetElementLocalizability(System::String ^ assembly, System::String ^ className);
abstract member GetElementLocalizability : string * string -> System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability

Docs.param: 包含要本地化的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 程序集的全名。
要检索其本地化信息的元素的完整类名。
Docs.summary: 返回一个值，该值指示指定类型的元素是否可本地化以及在可本地化时是否可设置为内联格式。
Docs.returns: 一个包含指定程序集和元素的本地化信息的对象。

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute GetPropertyLocalizability (string assembly, string className, string property);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute GetPropertyLocalizability(string assembly, string className, string property) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetPropertyLocalizability (assembly As String, className As String, property As String) As LocalizabilityAttribute
public: abstract System::Windows::LocalizabilityAttribute ^ GetPropertyLocalizability(System::String ^ assembly, System::String ^ className, System::String ^ property);
abstract member GetPropertyLocalizability : string * string * string -> System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute

Docs.param: 包含要本地化的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 程序集的全名。
要检索其本地化信息的元素的完整类名。
要检索其本地化信息的属性的名称。
Docs.summary: 返回一个值，该值指示指定类型的元素的指定属性是否可本地化。
Docs.returns: 一个指定属性是否可本地化以及如何本地化的对象。

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ResolveAssemblyFromClass (string className);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ResolveAssemblyFromClass(string className) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ResolveAssemblyFromClass (className As String) As String
public: abstract System::String ^ ResolveAssemblyFromClass(System::String ^ className);
abstract member ResolveAssemblyFromClass : string -> string

Docs.summary: 返回包含指定类的程序集的全名。
Docs.returns: 包含类的程序集的全名。

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ResolveFormattingTagToClass (string formattingTag);

Docs.summary: 返回 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中尚未遇到过的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 标记的完整类名。
Docs.returns: 与该标记关联的完整类名。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer> 或等效的将替代应用于可本地化资源时，将调用此方法。 如果在替换中遇到格式设置标记，则调用此方法以将格式设置标记解析回类名称。
